alert.note: Alert for Brevard (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued November 17 at 4:49AM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of east central Florida, including the following county, Brevard. * WHEN...Until 645 AM EST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 448 AM EST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 3 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Melbourne, Rockledge, Cocoa, Cocoa Beach, Satellite Beach, Cape Canaveral, Merritt Island, Patrick Air Force Base, Camp Holly Fish Camp, Indian Harbour Beach, Suntree, Viera, South Patrick Shores, Palm Shores, Space Coast Stadium, Pineda and Georgiana. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
